title: Falun Dafa is here - Hurry Up, Tell The World
contents:
Please let the people know that Falun Dafa, also know as Falun Gong is practiced all over the world and teaches us to stay on the path of "Truth, Compassion and Forbearance".

Help people recognize this.

For other language subtitles, please click: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=...

Please also visit: http://www.MusicToStopThePersecution.org
